WorkItem.Description:
Hello, I'm able to download the folder using subversion pointing to https://sccmclictr.svn.codeplex.com/svn.

But when I open the folder in visual studio 2010 it challenges me for login connecting to tfs.codeplex.com, please provide credentials to connect to team foundation server.
As your directions says only project members can connect to the project using TFS.  I'm a non members using Subversion, I get the files, but then I can't open them in VS 2010

What is the secret? 

See attached conversation with CodePlex admin Kevin David at Microsoft...

FileAttachments.FileName: RE Cannot Access Client Center for configuration manager.msg
